Pre-Game Insights: Heimir Hallgrímsson and John O’Shea are working together for the first time as Ireland's manager and assistant coach, respectively.
Nathan Collins, the captain of Ireland, admitted to being'sick' of the team's negative results.
Others: Ireland is currently ranked 62nd by Fifa, and a defeat to Finland, who are ranked 64th, would hasten that decline.

Finland manager Markku Kanerva must plan without the injured Sparta Prague midfielder Kaan Kairinen but Bayer Leverkusen goalkeeper Lucas Hradecky captains a side that will play through former Leeds United attacker Glen Kamara and Teemu Pukki, who has yet to be ruled out despite a hamstring issue.
